member.name: T:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Modules.GroupModule
member.summary: Represents a base type that defines a module that can be called by instance.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Modules.GroupModule.AllRoles
member.summary: Indicates all roles are included.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Modules.GroupModule.IsEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the module is currently enabled. If disabled (i.e. holding with value), this option won't be executed even if a person with a supported role emits a command executing this module.

remarks.i: This property is set by default.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Modules.GroupModule.RaisingCommand
member.summary: Indicates the raising command.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Modules.GroupModule.RequiredEnvironmentCommand
member.summary: Indicates the required environment command.

remarks.para: This property is used for controlling the case when it costs too much time to be executed.

para.i: This property is set by default.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Modules.GroupModule.RaisingPrefix
member.summary: Indicates the prefix of the command used for raising command exeuction. Assign to tell the runtime this module does not use any prefixes.
member.remarks: You can assign this property with values provided by type .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Modules.GroupModule.RequiredSenderRole
member.summary: Indicates the supported roles. The role is used for checking whether the module should be executed if a person emits a command to execute this module.

remarks.para: You can use . | to merge multiple role kinds into one.

para.i: By default, the value is all possible roles included.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Modules.GroupModule.RequiredBotRole
member.summary: Indicates the required bot permission. The kind is only set with one flag, as the highest allowed permission.

remarks.i: By default, the value is , which means the operation does not require any higher permissions.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns
member.summary: Extracts a type that stores regular expression patterns.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns.BilibiliPattern
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ 2nd capture group.
○ Match the string "哔哩".
○ Match the same text as matched by the 2nd capture group.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Bb].
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a whitespace character atomically at most 3 times.
○ Match '站'.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match 'i'.
○ 3rd capture group.
○ Match the string "li".
○ Match the string "bi".
○ Match the same text as matched by the 3rd capture group.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns.ColorIdPattern
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match '#'.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
○ Match a character in the set [1-9].
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match '1'.
○ Match a character in the set [0-5].

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns.ColorHexValuePattern
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match '#'.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Fa-f\d] exactly 6 times.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Fa-f\d] exactly 2 times.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns.ChineseHouseIndexPattern
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [\u5217\u5BAB\u884C].
○ Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [1-9].
